captions.text:
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey.
Hey, hey, hey, stop!

Stop. Look, I need
to borrow your...
Hey!

Something very familiar
about all this.

Those boards don't
work on water!
Unless you've got power!

title: Back to the Future Part 2 (3/12) Movie CLIP - Hover Board Chase (1989) HD
